title: [BUG]: Habit not removed from list immediately after deletion
body:
**Description**
When deleting a habit, the item does not immediately disappear from the habit list. It remains visible until the list is manually refreshed or revisited.

**Step to Reproduce**

1. Add any habit.
2. Delete the habit.
3. Observe that the deleted habit is still visible in the list until manually refreshed.

**Expected Behavior**
The deleted habit should be removed from the list immediately without requiring manual refresh.

**Screenshots**
https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/140a4c48-25e4-4c7f-83d5-3d62d28e0acb

**Device/Environment Info**
* Device: generic\_x86\_64 (Android Studio x86 emulator)
* OS: Android 9.0 (Default Android System Image)
* Version: v1.16.7+74
comments: ![](https://github.trello.services/images/mini-trello-icon.png) [Habit not removed from list immediately after deletion.](https://trello.com/c/KHugMVtx/108-habit-not-removed-from-list-immediately-after-deletion)
Thank you for identifying this issue. We'll look into it promptly.
